caption: Network Tunnel Activity
description: Network Tunnel Activity events report secure tunnel establishment, teardowns, renewals, and other network tunnel specific actions.
name: network_tunnel_activity

client_interface.description: The client interface of the tunnel. In a tunnelled session, this is the interface of the client which requested the tunnel. Ex: en0.

dst_endpoint.description: The destination endpoint of the tunnel activity.

src_endpoint.description: The source endpoint of the tunnel activity.

session.caption: Tunnel Session
session.description: The session associated with the tunnel activity.

traffic.description: Traffic refers to the amount of data moving across the tunnel at a given point of time. Ex: bytes_in and bytes_out.

tunnel_interface.description: The interface of the tunnel. In a tunnelled session, this is the virtual interface. Ex: utun1.

user.description: The user associated with the tunnel activity.
